mapper.insert: insert into report(m_id, email, reason, report_date) values(#{m_id}, #{email}, #{reason}, current_timestamp)
mapper.select: select m.*, count(r.report_id) as report_count from meetup m left join report r on m.m_id = r.m_id group by m.m_id
select count(*) from report r join meetup m on r.m_id = m.m_id where m.title like '%' || #{title} || '%'
